## üìä Interactive Plot (Plotly)

```{r}
library(plotly)

plot_ly(data = mtcars, x = ~mpg, y = ~hp,
        type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
        marker = list(size = 10)) %>%
  layout(title = "MPG vs Horsepower")
```

### Base R

```{r}
mean(mtcars$mpg)
```

### Tidyverse

```{r}
library(dplyr)
mtcars %>% summarise(mean_mpg = mean(mpg))
```
:::
